SpectrumBand.bandDesc: This band is allocated for exclusive Federal Government use. Operation of unlicensed Part 15 Devices is permitted between 225 and 235 MHz.
This band is allocated for exclusive Federal Government use. Operation of unlicensed Part 15 Devices is permitted between 235 and 240 MHz.
This band is allocated for exclusive Federal Government use. Operation of unlicensed Part 15 Devices is permitted between 285 and 322 MHz.
